txt.en:
To begin, click a virtue icon to select an 'earning' virtue which will receive the virtue experience that you gain. Many deeds will award virtue experience.

Once a virtue has reached rank 1, you can equip it to gain its benefits. To equip, drag a virtue icon to any of your virtue trait slots or right-click or double-click the virtue icon. You can unequip a virtue by dragging it off of its slot or by right clicking or double-clicking the virtue icon.

Virtue may be its own reward, but you also gain passive bonuses for every virtue rank you earn, even those not equipped.
